connector.description: Get data about current earthquake events happening in the world using the USGS API

camel.kamelet.earthquake-source.period.name: camel.kamelet.earthquake-source.period
camel.kamelet.earthquake-source.period.description: The interval between fetches to the earthquake API in milliseconds

camel.kamelet.earthquake-source.lookAhea.description: The amount of minutes to look ahead when starting the integration afresh
